title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: We know that we're trying to determine x such that $$x=\log_{8}\left(2\right)$$. Rewrite this expression first into exponential form.

title: Determing the Exponential Form
text: What is the exponential form of $$\log_{8}\left(2\right)=x$$?

title: Rewrite 8 in terms of 2

title: Solve for x
text: Substitution $$2^3$$ into the exponential equation we found before, we get $${\left(2^3\right)}^x=2^1$$. We can simplify this into $$2^{3x}=2^1$$. What is x?
